name: Unicredit - Avoid Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference  (XXE) vulnerabilities (CWE-611)
description:
This metric detects the usage of XML parser calls not preceeded in same Java method by a call to the secure mode of the parser.
The following checks are made :
for Xerces : external-general-entities set to false
 or disallow-doctype-decl set to true
for SAX : FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING
for DOM : FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING
for StAX and XMLInputFactory : SUPPORT_DTD set to false
for JAXB : need to ? same as SAX...
output:
This report lists all Java methods performing XML parser calls not preceeded in same Java method by a call to the secure mode of the parser.
It provides the following information:
 - Method full name
 - The associated value is the number of violation inside the violating method.
remediationSample: See sample remediation in references links
total: Number of Java methods (to keep it simple)
